summary: Adds a city wall to Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
Are you sick of hearing the guards talking about how poor the people of Riverwood are, that they don\'t even have any walls? Well shut them up with this mod! The village of Riverwood will be surrounded with their own thick, strong stone walls, protecting them from...anything that would attack the tiny settlement!

    If you enjoyed this mod, then please endorse this to support future development, and feel free to leave a comment with any ideas or suggestions that you may have. I am working on some other mods at the moment, and I will be uploading some more new, exciting content for all of you!

    Changelog:

    v.1.5:
    -Fixed floating walls
    -Fixed floating mushrooms
    -Fixed overlapping walls

    v1.5.5:
    -Navmeshed
    -Adjusted the height of some of the walls

    Next update plans:
    -Add imperial Guards into the village, and have them to garrison the walls.
    -Add a city gate, but one that will not show you a loading screen.
    -Minor bug fixes. 

    WARNING: DO NOT USE MORE THAN ONE VERSION OF THIS MOD AT A TIME. IT WILL PROBABLY CAUSE YOUR GAME TO CRASH.

    Thanks for the continued downloads, 
    EsvDefcon
author: EsvDefcon
